{"step_by_step_thinking": "Daptacel and IPOL are both vaccines, but they are used to protect against different diseases. Daptacel is a vaccine used to protect against diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis (whooping cough). IPOL, on the other hand, is a vaccine used to protect against polio. Since they protect against different diseases, Daptacel cannot be used instead of IPOL. Therefore, the answer is no.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
